Luca Christoph

About the project

Luca Christoph was one of my first WordPress website. The client sells luxury, handmade, designer rugs and the company planned to expand their business on an e-commerce platform.

Challenges

I haven’t built too many WordPress website before, and it was my very first e-commerce project, therefore I had to read some articles and tutorials about Woocommerce before I started to build the website. I have quickly overcome the initial difficulties and created a few versions of the website, because the client requested some changes. It was a very good lesson, how to deal with clients and their expectations. The site sits on a shared hosting platform, and using a loads of product photos, therefore the load speed is not optimal. Since I have studied this issue, and learnt about different ways of performance optimisation.
